name: Farmer Pip: Organic Panic
description:
Introduction

Farmer Pip: Organic Panic is a single player farming game where you cultivate your crops peacefully, planting seeds, fertilizer and taking the time for your plants to grow. Until harvest time arrives, where suddenly previously unassuming vegetables emerge from the earth to fight you over their produce and freedom from the farm. Combat and kill these vegetables to meet your farming quota and use these earnings to save up to reunite with your one true love, the XP90 farming tractor.

Objectives

1. Plant Vegetables to sell to the farmer.
2. Buy fertilizer to improve your soil quality to grow higher quality vegetables.
3. Fund for your tractor at your own pace to win the game!
4. (Optional:) Fund the truck for double money!

Controls

  M1: Attack
TAB: Open Inventory
       E: Interact 

Developed by The Mermaid MenZ

Ethan Uy - Team Lead, Programming Lead
Wilbur Arnott - Game Design Lead

Darren Contreras - Art Lead
Christian Logoia - 3D Generalist Artist, Props, Graybox
Ethan Buot - Environment and Setdressing
